securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

securityGroupIngress.description: allow ssh access from the world

securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

userData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
yum update -y
yum install python3 -y
yum install git -y
pip3 install boto3
git clone https://github.com/rouxelec/ec2_user_data.git
echo "* * * * * python3 /ec2_user_data/userdata.py" >> /tmp/montest
crontab /tmp/montest
